#### Load packages
```{r}
library(readr)
```

#### Read in data
```{r}
# read in data
stations <- read.fwf("data/RAWS.txt", widths = c(28, 14, 8, 10, 10), 
         col.names = c("station", "state", "elevation", "latitude", "longitude"), skip = 3, colClasses = c("character", "character", "integer", "integer"), stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
                          
```
